alert.note: Alert for Central Yampa River Basin; Lower Yampa River Basin (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 6:04PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Moffat County through 630 PM MDT... At 603 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 31 miles northwest of Meeker, or 39 miles west of Craig, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of south central Moffat County, including the following locations... Maybell and Sunbeam. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 40 in Colorado between mile markers 39 and 61. Colorado 318 between mile markers 43 and 60. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Yampa River Basin; Lower Yampa River Basin
